import pandas as pd 
import datetime
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
import pyspark.sql.functions as sf
from datetime import datetime 
from datetime import date 
from datetime import timedelta
# from pyspark.sql.functions import to_date
from datetime import time
import pytz
from pathlib import Path
import pymsteams

DCLoad = pd.read_csv("abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Antpr/Antpr_StaticData/Antpr_StaticData_PowerBI/Antpr_DCLoadLatLong.csv")

df_spark = spark.createDataFrame(DCLoad)
spark.sql("create database if not exists reassets")
df_spark.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable("reassets.DCLoadLatLong")

Tags = pd.read_csv("abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Antpr/Antpr_StaticData/Antpr_StaticData_PowerBI/Antpr_Tags.csv", encoding = 'Latin1')

df_spark = spark.createDataFrame(Tags)
spark.sql("create database if not exists reassets")
df_spark.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable("reassets.TAGS")

inv = pd.read_excel("abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Antpr/Antpr_StaticData/Antpr_StaticData_PowerBI/Antpr_Inverter.xlsx")

df_spark = spark.createDataFrame(inv)
spark.sql("create database if not exists reassets")
df_spark.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable("reassets.Inverter_TABLE2")

pvsyst = pd.read_csv("abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Antpr/Antpr_StaticData/Antpr_StaticData_PowerBI/Antpr_PVSyst.csv")

df_spark = spark.createDataFrame(pvsyst)
spark.sql("create database if not exists reassets")
df_spark.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable("reassets.PVSystData")

AntprLoss = pd.read_excel("abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Antpr/Antpr_StaticData/Antpr_StaticData_PowerBI/AntprLoss.xlsx",sheet_name = "Sheet2")

df_spark = spark.createDataFrame(AntprLoss)
spark.sql("create database if not exists reassets")
df_spark.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable("reassets.AntprstaticLoss")
